title: BRIEF-Lectra Fashion PLM chosen by Grupo Kaltex
text:
BRIEF-Lectra Fashion PLM chosen by Grupo Kaltex Sept 29 
Sept 29 Lectra SA : 
* Grupo Kaltex selects Lectra Fashion PLM to connect design and product development teams at their US subsidiary Revman International and their Mexican manufacturing division Kaltex Home Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:) Trending On Reuters
